subject: Golf
Executives and Management
Advertising and Marketing
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The L.P.G.A. is drawing big crowds, but many wonder if tour commissioner Carolyn Bivens is contributing to that success or thwarting it.
snippet: The L.P.G.A. is drawing big crowds, but many wonder if tour commissioner Carolyn Bivens is contributing to that success or thwarting it.
